content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM obtains most of your personal information through the forms and applications that you fill out and any documents you submit to EPAM in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. In addition, EPAM may obtain personal information about you from other sources, for example, our monitoring systems or the results of background checks or drug screenings (to the extent permitted by law).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
